reuters.title: OMB'S MILLER SAYS REAGAN WILL REJECT TAX INCREASE IN HOUSE 1988 BUDGET
reuters.body: Western Digtial Corp said it has completed the redemption of its 47 mln dlr, 6-3/4 pct convertible subordinated debentures due 2011. The redemption resulted in the issuance of 2,685,142 shares of the company's common stock, Western Digital said. Reuter 
